get.description: 获取围栏所有列表数据

schema.example:
{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "1号围栏",
            "area": "1111",
            "status": 1,
            "type": "111",
            "site": 1,
            "lng_min": null,
            "lng_max": null,
            "lat_min": null,
            "lat_max": null,
            "created_at": "2018-10-19 09:09:32",
            "updated_at": "2018-10-19 09:09:32",
            "site_link": {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "北京"
            }
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "1号围栏",
            "area": "1111",
            "status": 1,
            "type": "111",
            "site": 1,
            "lng_min": null,
            "lng_max": null,
            "lat_min": null,
            "lat_max": null,
            "created_at": "2018-10-19 09:10:33",
            "updated_at": "2018-10-19 09:10:33",
            "site_link": {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "北京"
            }
        }
    ],
    "status": 1,
    "code": 200,
    "msg": "",
    "link": {
        "first": "http:\/\/damalu.cn\/api\/admin\/express\/area?page=1",
        "last": "http:\/\/damalu.cn\/api\/admin\/express\/area?page=1",
        "prev": null,
        "next": null
    },
    "meta": {
        "current_page": 1,
        "from": 1,
        "last_page": 1,
        "path": "http:\/\/damalu.cn\/api\/admin\/express\/area",
        "per_page": 10,
        "to": 2,
        "total": 2
    }
}

{
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "测试1",
        "area": "1111",
        "status": 1,
        "type": "111",
        "site": 1,
        "lng_min": null,
        "lng_max": null,
        "lat_min": null,
        "lat_max": null,
        "created_at": "2018-10-19 09:09:32",
        "updated_at": "2018-10-19 09:19:05"
    },
    "status": 1,
    "code": 200,
    "msg": "修改成功"
}
